Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services

Interface CategoryBillService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CategoryBillServiceImpl
@Service public interface CategoryBillService
Service interface for managing category bills.

This interface provides methods to add and retrieve category bills.

  • Method Details

    • addCategoryBill

      CategoryBillResponseDTO addCategoryBill(CategoryBillRequestDTO categoryBillDTO)
      Adds a new category bill.
      Parameters:
      categoryBillDTO - The DTO containing category bill information.
      Returns:
      The response DTO for the newly added category bill.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a category with the same name already exists.

    • findAllCategories

      List<CategoryBillResponseDTO> findAllCategories()
      Retrieves all categories.
      Returns:
      A list of category bill response DTOs.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is an error fetching all categories.

    • findCategoryByName

      List<CategoryBillResponseDTO> findCategoryByName(String name)
      Finds categories by name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the category to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of category bill response DTOs matching the given name.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is an error fetching categories by name.

    • findCategoryById

      List<CategoryBillResponseDTO> findCategoryById(Long id)
      Finds categories by id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the category to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of category bill response DTOs matching the given id.

    • findCategoryByNameModel

      CategoryBill findCategoryByNameModel(String name)
      Finds categories by name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the category to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of Category Bill Model matching the given name.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is an error fetching categories by name.

    • findNameCategoryById

      String findNameCategoryById(Long id)
      Retrieves a category by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the category to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The name of the category.

    • getCategoryById

      CategoryBill getCategoryById(Long id)
      Retrieves a category by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the category to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The category.

    • existsById

      boolean existsById(Long categoryId)
      Checks if a category exists by its ID.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category to check.
      Returns:
      true if the category exists, false otherwise.

    • updateCategoryBill

      CategoryBillResponseDTO updateCategoryBill(Long id, CategoryBillRequestDTO categoryBillDTO)
      Update a category bill.
      Parameters:
      id - of the category bill
      categoryBillDTO - The DTO containing category bill information.
      Returns:
      The response DTO for the newly update category bill.

    • findCategories

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<CategoryBillResponseDTO> findCategories(Long id, Boolean isDeleted, String nameOrDes, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves categories.
      Parameters:
      id - Optional ID to filter categories.
      isDeleted - Optional flag to filter categories by their deletion status.
      nameOrDes - name or description for filter
      pageable - Pagination information including page number and size.
      Returns:
      A paginated list of CategoryBillResponseDTOs matching the criteria.

    • validNameRepeted

      Boolean validNameRepeted(String name)
      Retrieves true if name is not repeted.
      Parameters:
      name - of the category.
      Returns:
      true if name is not repeted, false if is repeted.
